name: harperdb-benchmark-test
description: A suite of scripts designed to benchmark HarperDB against some other popular distributed and/or edge-optimized databases.

scripts.all10: npm run harperdb10 && npm run sqlite10 && npm run neo4j10
scripts.all100: npm run harperdb100 && npm run sqlite100 && npm run neo4j100
scripts.all1000: npm run harperdb1000 && npm run sqlite1000 && npm run neo4j1000
scripts.all5000: npm run harperdb5000 && npm run sqlite5000 && npm run neo4j5000
scripts.all10000: npm run harperdb10000 && npm run sqlite10000 && npm run neo4j10000
